name: Productores de Música de España
membership:
PROMUSICAE is the Spanish group of IFPI, the International Federation of the Phonographic Industry.
www.ifpi.org
goal: PROMUSICAE is the trade association representing the music producers in Spain. representing more than 90 per cent of national and international activity of Spanish recorded music industry. PROMUSICAE’s membership includes all major labels as well as independent music companies, covering any music styles. PROMUSICAE’s main goal is to represent and defend the interests of Spanish music producers before the Public Administration and other private sectors.
euInitiatives:
European Commission consultation on the review of the Satellite and Cable Directive
European Commission consultation on online platforms and intermediaries
European Commission consultation on VAT
